entry.title: abp集成SQLite
entry.content:
集成SQLite

前言

SQLite是一款轻型的开源数据库引擎支持事务、跨平台、嵌入式等性点，在如今云计算被广泛应用的时代将其做为数据存储方式具体简单方便、代成本、零配置、自给自足的优势。

DbMigrator连接字符串

在项目找到appsettings.json修改如下:

 "ConnectionStrings": {
    "Default": "Data Source=D:/mytest.db;"
  }

HttpApi.Host连接字符串

在项目找到appsettings.json修改如下:

 "ConnectionStrings": {
    "Default": "Data Source=D:/mytest.db;"
  }

安装Sqlite支持

在EntityFrameworkCore项目中安装Volo.Abp.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite依赖包。

启用Sqlite支持

在EntityFrameworkCoreModule类中加入DependsOn如下代码:

[DependsOn(typeof(AbpEntityFrameworkCoreSqliteModule))]

在EntityFrameworkCoreModule类中的ConfigureServices方法加入如下代码：

Configure<AbpDbContextOptions>(options =>
{
    /* The main point to change your DBMS.
        * See also mytestMigrationsDbContextFactory for EF Core tooling. */
    //options.UseSqlServer();
    options.UseSqlite();
});

禁用数据库事务

注意：如果不禁用数据事务会出现database is locked异常。

在EntityFrameworkCoreModule类中的ConfigureServices方法加入如下代码：

//禁用数据库事务
Configure<AbpUnitOfWorkDefaultOptions>(options =>
{
    options.TransactionBehavior = UnitOfWorkTransactionBehavior.Disabled;
});

启用迁移支持

在EntityFrameworkCore.DbMigrations项目中的MigrationsDbContextFactory类的CreateDbContext修改如下代码: ```C# public mytestMigrationsDbContext CreateDbContext(string[] args) { mytestEfCoreEntityExtensionMappings.Configure();

var configuration = BuildConfiguration();

var builder = new DbContextOptionsBuilder<mytestMigrationsDbContext>()
    .UseSqlite(configuration.GetConnectionString("Default"));
    //.UseSqlServer(configuration.GetConnectionString("Default"));

return new mytestMigrationsDbContext(builder.Options); } ``` > 删除Migrations文件所有文件 ## 执行命令 > **提示：同时也可以运行控制台的DbMigrator程序**

添加

Add-Migration Initial_Sqlite

删除

Update-Database
entry.summary: 集成SQLite 前言 SQLite是一款轻型的开源数据库引擎支持事务、跨平台、嵌入式等性点，在如今云计算被广泛应用的时代将其做为数据存储方式具体简单方便、代成本、零配置、自给自足的优势。 DbMigrator连接字符串 在项目找到appsettings.json修改如下: "ConnectionStrings": { "Default": "Data Source=D:/mytest.db;" } HttpApi.Host连接字符串 在项目找到appsettings.json修改如下: "ConnectionStrings": { "Default": "Data Source=D:/mytest.db;" } 安装Sqlite支持 在EntityFrameworkCore项目中安装Volo.Abp.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite依赖包。 启用Sqlite支持 在EntityFrameworkCoreModule类中加入DependsOn如下代码: [DependsOn(typeof(AbpEntityFrameworkCoreSqliteModule))] 在EntityFrameworkCoreModule类中的ConfigureServices方法加入如下代码： Configure<AbpDbContextOptions>(options => { /* The main point to change your DBMS. * See also mytestMigrationsDbContextFactory for EF Core tooling. */ //options.UseSqlServer(); options.UseSqlite(); }); 禁用数据库事务 注意：如果不禁用数据事务会出现database is locked异常。

entry.title: abpvnext部署
entry.content:
安装nginx

配置 EPEL源

sudo yum install -y epel-release
sudo yum -y update

安装nginx

sudo yum install -y nginx

nginx目录

默认的配置文件为：/etc/nginx/nginx.conf

# 前端配置
server {
        listen       8080;
        server_name  localhost;
        root         /usr/local/appwasm;

        # Load configuration files for the default server block.
        include /etc/nginx/default.d/*.conf;

        location / {
            index  index.html index.htm;
            try_files $uri $uri/ /index.html =404;#必须配置404
        }
        error_page  404              /index.html;
    }
# 后端api配置
server {
        listen       80;
        server_name  localhost;

        #charset koi8-r;

        #access_log  logs/host.access.log  main;

        location / {
            proxy_pass http://localhost:5000;
            index  index.html index.htm index.jsp;
            proxy_http_version 1.1;
            proxy_set_header   Upgrade $http_upgrade;
            proxy_set_header   Connection keep-alive;
            proxy_set_header   Host $host;
            proxy_cache_bypass $http_upgrade;
            proxy_set_header   X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
            proxy_set_header   X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        }
    }

自定义配置文件目录为: /etc/nginx/conf.d/

操作nginx

  1. 启动 nginx 
    systemctl start nginx
  2. 停止nginx 
    systemctl stop nginx
  3. 重启nginx 
    systemctl restart nginx
nginx -s reload
  4. 查看nginx状态 
    systemctl status nginx
  5. 启用开机启动nginx 
    systemctl enable nginx
  6. 禁用开机启动nginx 
    systemctl disable nginx

    防火墙firewalld

    开启80端口

    firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-port=80/tcp --permanent

    命令含义： –zone #作用域 –add-port=80/tcp #添加端口，格式为：端口/通讯协议 –permanent #永久生效，没有此参数重启后失效

    重启防火墙

    firewall-cmd --reload

    查看端口

    firewall-cmd --list-all
firewall-cmd --list-port

    supervisor安装

    参考链接

    https://www.cnblogs.com/xueweihan/p/6195824.html

https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/260071860

https://www.cnblogs.com/flaming/p/8149973.html

名词解释

supervisor：要安装的软件的名称。 supervisord：装好supervisor软件后，supervisord用于启动supervisor服务。 supervisorctl：用于管理supervisor配置文件中program和supervisor服务本身。

使用yum命令安装（推荐）

yum install epel-release
yum install -y supervisor
systemctl enable supervisord # 开机自启动
systemctl start supervisord # 启动supervisord服务
systemctl stop supervisord # 停止supervisord服务
systemctl status supervisord # 查看supervisord服务状态
ps -ef|grep supervisord # 查看是否存在supervisord进程

配置dotnet命令

在/etc/supervisord.d目录下添加一个ini文件，同时也可以通过/etc目录下面的supervisord.conf文件中的[include]files进行自定义加载ini文件路径。

[program:myapp]
command=dotnet Wang.MyApp.HttpApi.Host.dll --urls=http://localhost:5000#要执行的命令
directory=/usr/local/apphost/#命令执行的目录
environment=ASPNETCORE__ENVIRONMENT=Production#环境变量
user=root#进程执行的用户身份
stopsignal=INT
autostart=true#是否自动重启
autorestart=true#是否自动启动
startsecs=10#自动重启间隔
stderr_logfile=/var/log/supervisor/myapp_err.log#标准错误日志
stdout_logfile=/var/log/supervisor/myapp_out.log#标准输出日志

注意：#后边的内容要去掉这里是注释但是supervisor不识别。

注意：#日志目录必须是已经存在的目录，不然会出现无法启动的情况。

卸载

yum -y remove supervisor
entry.summary: 安装nginx 配置 EPEL源 sudo yum install -y epel-release sudo yum -y update 安装nginx sudo yum install -y nginx nginx目录 默认的配置文件为：/etc/nginx/nginx.conf ```conf 前端配置 server { listen 8080; server_name localhost; root /usr/local/appwasm;

entry.title: abp集成ant blazor认证
entry.content:
添加认证回调

在Pages文件中添加名为”Authentication.razor”文件并输入如下代码。

@page "/authentication/{action}"
@using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Authentication
<RemoteAuthenticatorView Action="@Action" />

@code{
    [Parameter] 
    public string Action { get; set; }
}

渲染菜单

重写菜单

继承IMenuContributor接口并重写ConfigureMenuAsync方法加入以下代码。

public async Task ConfigureMenuAsync(MenuConfigurationContext context)
        {

            if (context.Menu.Name != StandardMenus.Main)
            {
                return;
            }

            var appLocalizer = context.GetLocalizer<MyAbpResource>();
            var tenantLocalizer = context.GetLocalizer<AbpTenantManagementResource>();

            context.Menu.Items.Insert(
                0,
                new ApplicationMenuItem(
                    "MyAbp.Home",
                    appLocalizer["Menu:Home"],
                    "/",
                    icon: "home"
                )
            );


            var administrationMenu = context.Menu.GetAdministration();
            administrationMenu.Items.RemoveAll(m => true);
            administrationMenu.Icon = "global";
            administrationMenu.Url = "/admin";

            var tenantManagementMenuItem = new ApplicationMenuItem(TenantManagementMenuNames.GroupName, tenantLocalizer["Menu:TenantManagement"], url: "/tenant-management", icon: "solution");
            administrationMenu.AddItem(tenantManagementMenuItem);
            if (await context.IsGrantedAsync(TenantManagementPermissions.Tenants.Default))
            {
                tenantManagementMenuItem.AddItem(new ApplicationMenuItem(TenantManagementMenuNames.Tenants, tenantLocalizer["Tenants"], url: "/tenant-management/tenants"));
            }

            var hasRolePermission = await context.IsGrantedAsync(IdentityPermissions.Roles.Default);
            var hasUserPermission = await context.IsGrantedAsync(IdentityPermissions.Users.Default);

            if (hasRolePermission || hasUserPermission)
            {
                var identityLocalizer = context.GetLocalizer<IdentityResource>();

                var identityMenuItem = new ApplicationMenuItem(IdentityMenuNames.GroupName, identityLocalizer["Menu:IdentityManagement"], url:"/identity", icon: "team");
                administrationMenu.AddItem(identityMenuItem);

                if (hasRolePermission)
                {
                    identityMenuItem.AddItem(new ApplicationMenuItem(IdentityMenuNames.Roles, identityLocalizer["Roles"], url: "/identity/roles"));
                }

                if (hasUserPermission)
                {
                    identityMenuItem.AddItem(new ApplicationMenuItem(IdentityMenuNames.Users, identityLocalizer["Users"], url: "/identity/users"));
                }
            }
        }

获取菜单

在MainLayout.razor文件中替换如下代码。

@inherits LayoutComponentBase
@using Volo.Abp.Ui.Branding
@using Volo.Abp.UI.Navigation;
@inject IBrandingProvider BrandingProvider
<AntDesign.Pro.Layout.BasicLayout Logo="@("https://gw.alipayobjects.com/zos/rmsportal/KDpgvguMpGfqaHPjicRK.svg")" MenuData="NavMenu.ToArray()">
    <RightContentRender>

    </RightContentRender>
    <ChildContent>
        @Body
    </ChildContent>
</AntDesign.Pro.Layout.BasicLayout>
@code
{
    private List<MenuDataItem> NavMenu { get; set; }

    [Inject]
    protected IMenuManager MenuManager { get; set; }

    protected override async Task OnInitializedAsync()
    {
        await base.OnInitializedAsync();

        CreateMenu(await MenuManager.GetAsync(StandardMenus.Main));
    }

    protected void CreateMenu(ApplicationMenu Menu)
    {
        NavMenu = new List<MenuDataItem>();

        foreach (var item in Menu.Items)
        {
            var menu = new MenuDataItem()
            {
                Path = item.Url,
                Name = item.DisplayName,
                Key = item.Name,
                Icon = item.Icon
            };

            if (item.Items.Count>0)
                menu.Children = CreateChildMenu(item).ToArray();

            NavMenu.Add(menu);
        }
    }

    protected List<MenuDataItem> CreateChildMenu(ApplicationMenuItem Menu)
    {
        List<MenuDataItem> menu = new List<MenuDataItem>();
        foreach (var item in Menu.Items)
        {
            var child = new MenuDataItem()
            {
                Path=item.Url,
                Name = item.DisplayName,
                Key = item.Name,
                Icon = item.Icon
            };

            if (item.Items.Count>0)
                child.Children = CreateChildMenu(item).ToArray();
            
            menu.Add(child);
        }
        return menu;
    }
}

效果图
entry.summary: 添加认证回调 在Pages文件中添加名为”Authentication.razor”文件并输入如下代码。 ```C# @page “/authentication/{action}” @using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Authentication

entry.title: abp集成ant blazor
entry.content:
引入Ant Design of Blazor包

 Install-Package AntDesign -Version 0.4.0-nightly-2011120611
 Install-Package AntDesign.Pro.Layout -Version 0.1.0-nightly-201103141915
 Install-Package AntDesign.Charts -Version 0.2.0

注册Ant Design of Blazor服务

1.注册服务

在MyAbpBlazorModule文件中ConfigureServices方法加入以下代码

  context.Services.AddAntDesign();

2.添加命名空间

在_Imports.razor文件中加入以下代码

  @using AntDesign
  @using AntDesign.Charts
  @using AntDesign.Pro.Layout

添加Ant Design of Blazor组件

1.添加css

在wwwroot文件中的index.html文件加入以下代码

 <link href="_content/AntDesign/css/ant-design-blazor.css" rel="stylesheet" />
 <link href="_content/AntDesign.Pro.Layout/css/ant-design-pro-layout-blazor.css" rel="stylesheet" />

2.添加js

 <script src="_content/AntDesign.Charts/g2plot.js"></script>
 <script src="_content/AntDesign/js/ant-design-blazor.js"></script>
 <script src="_content/AntDesign.Charts/ant-design-charts-blazor.js"></script>

3.添加html代码

<app id="root">
        <style>
            html,
            body,
            #root {
                height: 100%;
                margin: 0;
                padding: 0;
            }

            #root {
                //background-image: url('<%= context.config.publicPath +"home_bg.png"%>');
                background-repeat: no-repeat;
                background-size: 100% auto;
            }

            .page-loading-warp {
                padding: 98px;
                display: flex;
                justify-content: center;
                align-items: center;
            }

            .ant-spin {
                -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
                box-sizing: border-box;
                margin: 0;
                padding: 0;
                color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65);
                font-size: 14px;
                font-variant: tabular-nums;
                line-height: 1.5;
                list-style: none;
                -webkit-font-feature-settings: 'tnum';
                font-feature-settings: 'tnum';
                position: absolute;
                display: none;
                color: #1890ff;
                text-align: center;
                vertical-align: middle;
                opacity: 0;
                -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.78, 0.14, 0.15, 0.86);
                transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.78, 0.14, 0.15, 0.86);
                transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.78, 0.14, 0.15, 0.86);
                transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.78, 0.14, 0.15, 0.86), -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.78, 0.14, 0.15, 0.86);
            }

            .ant-spin-spinning {
                position: static;
                display: inline-block;
                opacity: 1;
            }

            .ant-spin-dot {
                position: relative;
                display: inline-block;
                font-size: 20px;
                width: 20px;
                height: 20px;
            }

            .ant-spin-dot-item {
                position: absolute;
                display: block;
                width: 9px;
                height: 9px;
                background-color: #1890ff;
                border-radius: 100%;
                -webkit-transform: scale(0.75);
                -ms-transform: scale(0.75);
                transform: scale(0.75);
                -webkit-transform-origin: 50% 50%;
                -ms-transform-origin: 50% 50%;
                transform-origin: 50% 50%;
                opacity: 0.3;
                -webkit-animation: antSpinMove 1s infinite linear alternate;
                animation: antSpinMove 1s infinite linear alternate;
            }

                .ant-spin-dot-item:nth-child(1) {
                    top: 0;
                    left: 0;
                }

                .ant-spin-dot-item:nth-child(2) {
                    top: 0;
                    right: 0;
                    -webkit-animation-delay: 0.4s;
                    animation-delay: 0.4s;
                }

                .ant-spin-dot-item:nth-child(3) {
                    right: 0;
                    bottom: 0;
                    -webkit-animation-delay: 0.8s;
                    animation-delay: 0.8s;
                }

                .ant-spin-dot-item:nth-child(4) {
                    bottom: 0;
                    left: 0;
                    -webkit-animation-delay: 1.2s;
                    animation-delay: 1.2s;
                }

            .ant-spin-dot-spin {
                -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg);
                -ms-transform: rotate(45deg);
                transform: rotate(45deg);
                -webkit-animation: antRotate 1.2s infinite linear;
                animation: antRotate 1.2s infinite linear;
            }

            .ant-spin-lg .ant-spin-dot {
                font-size: 32px;
                width: 32px;
                height: 32px;
            }

                .ant-spin-lg .ant-spin-dot i {
                    width: 14px;
                    height: 14px;
                }

            @media all and (-ms-high-contrast: none), (-ms-high-contrast: active) {
                .ant-spin-blur {
                    background: #fff;
                    opacity: 0.5;
                }
            }

            @-webkit-keyframes antSpinMove {
                to {
                    opacity: 1;
                }
            }

            @keyframes antSpinMove {
                to {
                    opacity: 1;
                }
            }

            @-webkit-keyframes antRotate {
                to {
                    -webkit-transform: rotate(405deg);
                    transform: rotate(405deg);
                }
            }

            @keyframes antRotate {
                to {
                    -webkit-transform: rotate(405deg);
                    transform: rotate(405deg);
                }
            }
        </style>
        <div style="
          display: flex;
          justify-content: center;
          align-items: center;
          flex-direction: column;
          min-height: 420px;
          height: 100%;
        ">
            <img src="./pro_icon.svg" alt="logo" width="256" />
            <div class="page-loading-warp">
                <div class="ant-spin ant-spin-lg ant-spin-spinning">
                    <span class="ant-spin-dot ant-spin-dot-spin">
                        <i class="ant-spin-dot-item"></i><i class="ant-spin-dot-item"></i><i class="ant-spin-dot-item"></i><i class="ant-spin-dot-item"></i>
                    </span>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center;">
                <img src="https://gw.alipayobjects.com/zos/rmsportal/KDpgvguMpGfqaHPjicRK.svg" width="32"
                     style="margin-right: 8px;" />
                Ant Design Blazor
            </div>
        </div>
    </app>

卸载默认主题

在Abp的Blzaor项目默认使用的主题是Volo.Abp.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.BasicTheme.Themes.Basic导入风格和布局和Ant Design of Blazor有差异，最终 我选择的将其卸载掉不用并重写自定义布局界面。

注意：暂时不清楚项目在后期是否出错，所以我按照默认主题的路径和命名进行重写。

注意：卸载掉主题后请在MyAbpBlazorModule移除相关代码

Uninstall-Package Volo.Abp.AspNetCore.Mvc.UI.Theme.Basic

1.添加MainLayout.razor文件并输入如下代码

@inherits LayoutComponentBase
@using Volo.Abp.Ui.Branding
@inject IBrandingProvider BrandingProvider
<AntDesign.Pro.Layout.BasicLayout Logo="@("https://gw.alipayobjects.com/zos/rmsportal/KDpgvguMpGfqaHPjicRK.svg")" MenuData="_menuData">
    <RightContentRender>

    </RightContentRender>
    <ChildContent>
        @Body
    </ChildContent>
</AntDesign.Pro.Layout.BasicLayout>
@code
{
    private MenuDataItem[] _menuData = { };

    protected override async Task OnInitializedAsync()
    {
        await base.OnInitializedAsync();
        _menuData = new MenuDataItem[3];
        _menuData[0] = new MenuDataItem() {
            Path= "/menu1",
            Name= "菜单1",
            Key= "menu1",
            Icon= "global"
        };

        _menuData[1] = new MenuDataItem()
        {
            Path = "/menu2",
            Name = "菜单2",
            Key = "menu2",
            Icon = "table"
        };

        _menuData[2] = new MenuDataItem()
        {
            Path = "/menu3",
            Name = "菜单3",
            Key = "menu3",
            Icon = "user"
        };
    }
}

2.添加App.razor文件并输入如下代码

@using Volo.Abp.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Theming.Routing
@using Microsoft.Extensions.Options
@inject IOptions<AbpRouterOptions> RouterOptions
<CascadingAuthenticationState>
    <Router AppAssembly="RouterOptions.Value.AppAssembly"
            AdditionalAssemblies="RouterOptions.Value.AdditionalAssemblies">
        <Found Context="routeData">
            <AuthorizeRouteView RouteData="@routeData" DefaultLayout="@typeof(MainLayout)">
                <NotAuthorized>
                    @if (!context.User.Identity.IsAuthenticated)
                    {
                        <RedirectToLogin />
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        <p>You are not authorized to access this resource.</p>
                    }
                </NotAuthorized>
            </AuthorizeRouteView>
        </Found>
        <NotFound>
            <LayoutView Layout="@typeof(MainLayout)">
                <p>Sorry, there's nothing at this address.</p>
            </LayoutView>
        </NotFound>
    </Router>
</CascadingAuthenticationState>

3.添加RedirectToLogin.razor文件并输入如下代码

@inject NavigationManager Navigation
@using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Authentication
@code {
    protected override void OnInitialized()
    {
        Navigation.NavigateTo($"authentication/login?returnUrl={Uri.EscapeDataString(Navigation.Uri)}");
    }
}

4.Index.razor文件修改并输入入如下代码

@page "/"
@using Volo.Abp.Users
@using Volo.Abp.MultiTenancy
@using Microsoft.Extensions.Localization
@using MyAbp.Localization
@inject ICurrentUser CurrentUser
@inject ICurrentTenant CurrentTenant
@inject AuthenticationStateProvider AuthenticationStateProvider
@inject IStringLocalizer<MyAbpResource> L
<Button Class="ant-btn ant-btn-primary">我的第一个Ant Design of Blazor主题按钮</Button>

效果图

  1. 项目结构图

  1. 运行效果图
